text.section:
The University of Maryland shall identify laboratories that:
Follow the recommended soil testing procedures for the mid-Atlantic United States; and
Provide a final report to a requestor of soil testing with the results of a soil test.

The University of Maryland shall review its fertilizer turf guidelines every 3 years and revise the guidelines as necessary, with consideration of plant nutrient requirements and established State goals to protect water quality in the waters of the State.
